CustomField.formula: (Gross_Receipts_TurnoverSales__c + Other_Income_not_relevant_to_key_buss__c) + (Buy_No_of_hr_opearted_in_a_day__c * Buy_Cost_of_Fuel_per_litre__c * Buy_Fuel_Avg_in_LtrHr__c * Buy_No_working_days_in_month__c) + (Buy_Drivers_Salary__c + Buy_CleanerOperator_Salary__c + Buy_Taxes_Permit__c + Buy_Maintenance_Cost__c + Buy_Misc_Exps__c + Buy_Proposed_Emi__c)
CustomField.label: Total Buy Cost
